    publications

    Evolution and host-specific adaptation of Pseudomonas aeruginosa

    Published in Science, 2024

    In this work, we demonstrated how the major human pathogen Pseudomonas aeruginosa has adapted to infected humans during the past 200 years.

    Recommended citation: Weimann A., Dinan A.M., Ruis C., Bernut A., Pont S., Brown K., …, Parkhill J., Floto R.A. (2024). "Evolution and host-specific adaptation of Pseudomonas aeruginosa" Science. 385 (6704), eadi0908.
    Download Paper
